name: claude-code-kit
description: Framework-specific plugins for Claude Code with automatic detection and installation

plugins.name: nextjs
plugins.description: Next.js 15+ App Router, Server Components, Server Actions

plugins.name: react
plugins.description: React 18+ hooks, Suspense, lazy loading, TypeScript patterns

plugins.name: express
plugins.description: Express.js routing, middleware, controllers, error handling

plugins.name: nodejs
plugins.description: Node.js backend patterns with TypeScript and layered architecture

plugins.name: prisma
plugins.description: Prisma ORM patterns for type-safe database access

plugins.name: tailwindcss
plugins.description: Tailwind CSS v4 utility patterns and responsive design

plugins.name: shadcn
plugins.description: shadcn/ui component library with Radix UI primitives

plugins.name: mui
plugins.description: Material-UI v7 components and sx prop styling

plugins.name: tanstack-query
plugins.description: TanStack Query v5 data fetching and cache management

plugins.name: tanstack-router
plugins.description: TanStack Router file-based routing with type-safe navigation
